name: Gisell Tavarez
title: Full-Stack Developer | Paramedic
summary: Full-stack developer and practicing paramedic transitioning into tech, combining real-time decision making, systems thinking, and user-centered design to build responsive, resilient web applications.

projects.name: HuskiesHub
projects.description: A softball platform for the Empire State Huskies with player profiles, schedules, clinics, and college commits.

projects.name: Smart Budget Planner
projects.description: Smart budgeting dashboard with category insights, monthly overviews, and benchmark comparisons.

experience.title: Paramedic
highlights: Led rapid triage and decision-making in high-pressure environments, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams (fire, police, hospital staff).
Documented critical information with high accuracy, mirroring the attention to detail needed for production systems.
Trained new team members, explaining complex protocols clearly and calmly.

details: Built full-stack applications with React and Node.js.
Worked in agile-style sprints, using GitHub for version control and code reviews.
